abstract: North Carolina men's basketball team, which returns all five starters from the 2010-2011 season, is set to begin its season Nov 11; team's new uniforms have a different shade of blue, which is upsetting some traditionalists.
snippet: North Carolina, which returns all five starters from last year’s 29-8 men’s basketball team, will begin its season Nov. 11 with a new look and a game on an aircraft carrier.
lead_paragraph: North Carolina, which returns all five starters from last year’s 29-8 men’s basketball team, will begin its season Nov. 11 with a new look and a game on an aircraft carrier.

headline.main: Path May Be Untraditional, but the Tar Heels’ Goal Is the Same
headline.print_headline: Path May Be Untraditional, but the Tar Heels’ Goal Is the Same
headline.seo: Tar Heels Face Different Challenges but Goal Is the Same
